review: If you are looking for an injury attorney, then Aaron Heaton is the best choice. He is very nice and extremely knowledgeable. He was willing to answer all my questions, even before I hired him. He has represented my husband and I on two different occasions. He did an amazing job both times. He handled all paper work and negotiations. Once I hired him, I didn't have to do a single thing. I highly recommend him. You won't be disappointed.
